GK19aghatkvu:0: ghaṭakarparakāvyam śrīmanmahāmāheśvarācāryaśrīmadabhinavaguptapādaracitavivṛtyupetam apūrvaḥ ko 'yaṃ te varada śirasaḥ śekharavidhir nanu jñātaṃ pluṣṭaṃ smaradhanur idaṃ mūrdhani dhṛtam yadālokāl loke viṣamaviśikhaḥ sphūrjatitarām iti prokte devyā galitaniyamaḥ śambur avatāt
GK19aghatkvu:1: idaṃ proṣitapramadayā hetubhūtayā proṣitapramadām uddiśya kathyate kulakam
GK19aghatkvu:7: proṣitaḥ pramado vallabho harṣaś ca yasyāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:10: anyadeśatayā viyuktatvam eva proṣitatvena lakṣyate chādite dinakarasya bhāvane khāj jale patati śokabhāvane /
GK19aghatkvu:11: manmathe ca hṛdi hantum udyate proṣitapramadayedam udyate // Ghk_1 //
GK19aghatkvu:12: dinaṃ karotīti dinakaras tasya bhāvane raśmipuñje chādite tiraskṛte sati tāsāṃ tamaḥpratipakṣatayā suprasiddhānām api sa sūryo yatra ācchādyate tatra kathaṃ harṣāloko 'pi mānaso 'stu, athaca virahiṇīnāṃ rajanisamayajanitaraṇaraṇakakaluṣitahṛdayāṇāṃ kadācit dinam api vividhavinodālokavitaraṇena bandhutāṃ yāyāt |
GK19aghatkvu:13: adya tu yatprasādāt tādṛśadinam upajāyate tasya api kaścid ātmīyaḥ sahajaḥ svabhāvaḥ, so 'pi
GK19aghatkvu:18: jalaṃ hi nikaṭavartinā pārthivarajasā ātmānaṃ bhāvayati ekatayā yojayatīti śrutam idam, adya tu apūrvaṃ vartate śokena virahiṇīr bhāvayati śokamayya eva sampādyante tāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:19: na hi tāsāṃ prāvṛṭsamayamadhye priyāgamanaśaṅkāmātram api astīti tātkālaṃ nairāśyam eva khāt patatīty anena amuṣya duṣprasahasya apratīkāratayā sātiśayo 'nutāpaḥ sūcyate |
GK19aghatkvu:21: athaca bāhyo yaḥ kaścit hantā tasmād upāyaiḥ palāyyate 'pi, ayaṃ punar hṛdayāvasthita eva antarhananaṃ prati sasaṃrambhaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:23: yathā kaścit durjano nirjane nirāloke durdina eva saśokaṃ janam ata eva nirudhyamānam ekākinaṃ prāpyaiva labdhacchidraḥ
GK19aghatkvu:24: praharati, tathāiva amuṣmin kāla īdṛśam iva kāminījanaṃ madanas tāḍayatīty arthaḥ || GhkV_1
GK19aghatkvu:25: sarvakālam ativāhya toyadā āgatāḥ stha dayito gato yadā /
GK19aghatkvu:26: nirdayena paradeśasevinā māriṣyatha hi tena māṃ vinā // Ghk_2 //
GK19aghatkvu:29: macchokabhāvakajalavitaraṇodyatā yatra vayaṃ priyaviyuktā na abhūma,
GK19aghatkvu:30: tādṛśaṃ kālam ativāhya yatra kvacit yāpayitvā yadā adya dayito gatas tadā yūyam āgatāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:31: tathā sarvaṃ kālaṃ diṣṭam athaca kṛtāntarūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā matibāhyā amanojñamanasaḥpīḍakatvāt te ca toyadāś ceti vigrahaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:32: ataś ca māṃ māriṣyatha, kākvā uktiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:34: yena dayitajanavirahitā bhīṣaṇabhavadīyacaritāvalokanaparikhinnahṛdayā jīvitatyāgena api sukham āsīnā |
GK19aghatkvu:35: athaca dayitena vinā yā jīvati sā avaśyavadhārhaiva |
GK19aghatkvu:36: yaś ca dirdayaḥ san paradeśaṃ sevate, sa cet dayitāyā
GK19aghatkvu:38: na hi asau jaladharasamaye kim api kāryaṃ kartum samartha iti avaśyam eka eva kvacana ciram āste iti |
GK19aghatkvu:39: tasmād asmāsu upari prema tāvad āstām; dayām api yadi
GK19aghatkvu:40: akariṣyat, tad avaśyam ihaiva āgamiṣyad ity etāvatī kaṣṭaparampareti anena viśvāsaparipāṭījanitadauḥsthityasūcakena dhvanyate || GhkV_2 ||
GK19aghatkvu:41: priyatamaṃ prati nijāvasthāṃ jijñāpayiṣur bhīṣaṇajaladavijṛmbhām asahiṣṇur yuktyā kathaṃcid vacanāt yadi amī deśāntaraṃ vrajeyus tat sarvaṃ sampatsyate |
GK19aghatkvu:42: priyatamo 'pi ca taddeśaprāptajaladharadhvānākarṇanena kadācit madīyām avasthāṃ svayaṃ vā anubhaved api ity abhiprāyeṇa nāyikā idam āha
GK19aghatkvu:43: brūta taṃ pathikapāṃsulaṃ ghanā yūyam eva pathiśīghralaṅgan /
GK19aghatkvu:44: anyadeśaratir adya mucyatāṃ sāthavā tava vadhūḥ kim ucyatām // Ghk_3 //
GK19aghatkvu:45: he ghanāḥ ! meghāḥ, athaca atinibiḍāḥ, ata eva hananaśīlāḥ, tam pathikānām madhye pāṃsulaṃ nirmaryādaṃ nirdayaṃ brūta |
GK19aghatkvu:46: etad eva tasya abhijñānaṃ yat pathikeṣu madhye sa eva nirdaya ity arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:47: yato yūyam eva pathaḥ śīghraṃ laṅgayathety anena katham itaḥ kṣipram eva vrajeyur iti protsāhanā dhvanyate |
GK19aghatkvu:48: brūteti ca adhyeṣaṇā iyam, laṅganaṃ ca ciravrajitasya api jhagiti āsādanam |
GK19aghatkvu:49: priyatamo hi cirakālaṃ proṣitaḥ, sa katham yo mārgaṃ laṅghayitum na śakyas tena adya itaś calitena labhyeteti
GK19aghatkvu:52: anyasmin deśe yā iyaṃ ratir vinā api kāryam āsaktiḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:53: athaca vallabhāntareṇa saha premavisrambho na hi anyathā ambudharakālo 'tivāhya iti, sā ratir mucyatām |
GK19aghatkvu:54: avaśyaṃ hi tayā ratyā bhavān grathita eveti upālambhagarbhā uktiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:57: atha kathaṃ prema savisrambhaṃ śithilayituṃ śaktas tarhi sā tava vadhūr na punaḥ
GK19aghatkvu:60: āvedayāmaḥ, niścitaṃ tu prāṇān naiva dhārayet |
GK19aghatkvu:61: athavā sāthavā tava vadhūr ity etāvat sandeśavacanam abhidhāya kim ahaṃ kathaṃ vā bhaveyam iti kim alīkavikatthaneneti avaśyam eva na jīvāmīty arthaḥ || GhkV_3 ||
GK19aghatkvu:62: haṃsapaṅktir api nātha samprati prasthitā viyati mānasaṃ prati /
GK19aghatkvu:63: cātakaś ca tṛṣito 'mbu yācate duḥkhitā pathika sā priyā ca te // Ghk_4 //
GK19aghatkvu:64: yadi punar adya mārge gamanam āgamanaṃ ca na yujyate iti śaṅkyate,
GK19aghatkvu:65: tad evaṃ brūteti nāyikā āha -- he pathika ! na hi bhavān nityaṃ yathā gacchati, ato yadā taddeśagato 'bhūt tadā sā priyā śrūyate sma |
GK19aghatkvu:66: ataḥ cātakas tṛṣākrānto jalaṃ yācate, sā ca tava yāñcāṃ karoti |
GK19aghatkvu:68: tvaṃ tu tadīyayāñcāṃ prati na kārakaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:69: sa hi yāñcāṃ prati kārako bhavati yaḥ kadācit āśāpūraṇaṃ karoti
GK19aghatkvu:72: ata eva āha na prabhuḥ paryanuyogārhaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:73: haṃsānāṃ sambandhinī paṅktir atibahavo 'pi haṃsā adya ākāśamārge mānasaṃ prati pracalitāḥ
GK19aghatkvu:75: 'pi hi yatra gacchati, tatra avaśyam aparasya api aniruddhena pathā
GK19aghatkvu:78: yataś ca jaladharamuktajalapaṭale te viyato bhuvi sañcaranti tasya yad ekāyatanam ākāśaṃ tad eva haṃsānāṃ mārgatvena vartate |
GK19aghatkvu:80: yatra ca atidūraṃ mānasaṃ gantuṃ nirbuddhīnām api haṃsānām udyamaḥ, tatra parimitadeśanivṛttimātra eva na kim iti sā priyā bhavato yācate || GhkV_4 ||
GK19aghatkvu:81: nīlaśaṣpam abhibhāti komalaṃ vāri vindati ca cātako 'malam /
GK19aghatkvu:82: ambudaiḥ śikhigaṇo vinādyate kā ratiḥ priya mayā vinādya te // Ghk_5 //
GK19aghatkvu:83: nīlaṃ śaṣpākhyaṃ tṛṇaṃ sarvato bhāti, cātako nirmalaṃ jalaṃ vindati jalaṃ labhate, mayūrakulaṃ ca meghaiḥ kekāyuktaṃ kriyate ity etair vākyair pratyuta iha āgacchatas tava kim api pathi manoharatvam iti dhvanyate |
GK19aghatkvu:84: nīlaṃ ca śaṣpam avalokayatas tatsukumāratarasparśānubhavasukhitacaraṇayugalasya gagananipatitāmalajaladalitaklamasya muditamayūraracitakekākaraṇanirbharavikasvarakarṇadvayasya avaśyaṃ sarvam eva sukham |
GK19aghatkvu:85: adya tu tūṣṇīṃ sthitasya mayā vinā kā ratiḥ, na kācid iti
GK19aghatkvu:87: athaca mama īdṛśī avasthā yato vartate, tato māṃ prati śaṣpaṃ nīlaṃ malinasvabhāvam api komalaṃ karuṇārdram iva bhāti |
GK19aghatkvu:88: cātakaś ca yo nāmnaiva priyagaganajalaḥ prasiddhaḥ, so 'pi jalam iha labhate, na tathā pibatīti pratīyamānā utprekṣā |
GK19aghatkvu:89: ambudaiś ca virahihṛdayasphoṭanapaṭutaragarjitair api mamopari karuṇāvaśāt nijasuhṛtkulam ākrandavat sampādyate |
GK19aghatkvu:90: kā punar mayā vinā mama abhāve kā aratiḥ kaḥ khedaḥ, na kaścit |
GK19aghatkvu:91: tathā mama abhāve bhavataḥ kā iyaṃ ratiḥ ko 'yam anubandhaḥ, sā mriyatām iti |
GK19aghatkvu:92: athaca prāṅ mayā vinā tava ratir na kadācid abhūt, adya tu kathaṃ sā ratiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:93: adyety anena prāg atyantapremarasamānasatām kapaṭena kila prakaṭitavān asīti dhvanyate |
GK19aghatkvu:94: ata eva sotprāsaṃ priyeti āmantraṇam iti upālambhagarbhā bhaṇitiḥ || GhkV_5 ||
GK19aghatkvu:96: toyadāgamakṛśā ca sādya te durdhareṇa madanena sādyate // Ghk_6 //
GK19aghatkvu:97: amī ye bhavatā puraḥ paridṛśyante kalāpinas te meghānāṃ secanapradhānānāṃ sambandhinā śabdena muditāḥ kekāpriyatvāt, tathā ca proṣitānāṃ kāntānāṃ sambandhini hṛdaye śokaṃ lāpayanti samyak śleṣayanti avaśyaṃ, tathā proṣitānāṃ hṛdaye śokaṃ lapanti teṣu hi kūjatsu avaśyaṃ virahiṇyaḥ śokavatya iti niścīyate, tathā proṣitāhṛdayaṃ śokena lāpayanti dravīkurvate |
GK19aghatkvu:98: sā ca te priyā adya ca tava durdhareṇa kāmena pūrvaṃ hi kāmabhayabhītāyās tvam eva śaraṇam abhūḥ, adya tu iha sthitasya tava madano durdhara iti durnivāraḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:101: tathā tavaiva sannihitasya sā toyadāgame kṛśā abhūt |
GK19aghatkvu:102: āgamiṣyati jaladharasamayaḥ pravatsyati ca priyatamaḥ iti raṇaraṇakavatī bhavatsannidhāne kṛśā babhūva |
GK19aghatkvu:103: adya tatra madhye bhūyān kālo gata iti asyā adya hitena bhavitavyam iti kavinibaddhadūtīvacanam idam |
GK19aghatkvu:104: na hi meghānāṃ svayam eva "meghaśabdamuditāḥ" iti "toyadāgama-" iti ca svātantryeṇa kathayitum ucitam |
GK19aghatkvu:105: "ambudaiḥ śikhigaṇo vinādyate" ity atre tu prāktanaśloke meghamukhasañcāritākṣarā nāyikā eva kavinā vaktṛtvena upanibaddhā, iha tu naivam || GhkV_6 ||
GK19aghatkvu:106: kiṃ kṣamāpi tava nāsti kāntayā pāṇḍugaṇḍapatitālakāntayā /
GK19aghatkvu:107: śokasāgarajale ca pātitāṃ tvadguṇasmaraṇam eva pāti tām // Ghk_7 //
GK19aghatkvu:108: sakhyā eva dūtītvena preṣitāyā iyaṃ bhaṇitiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:110: tādṛśī api yā kāntā lāvaṇyadyasādhāraṇabhūtā, sā yadi īdṛśavat jāyate, tat kiṃ tayā hetubhūtayā kṣamā api nāsti |
GK19aghatkvu:111: pānḍuracchāyayoḥ kapolayoḥ patitā alakāntā yasyāḥ tadīyakapolatalapāṇḍimānaṃ malinasvabhāvā alakā api prekṣituṃ na pārayantīty arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:113: tvaṃ yadi tasyā vallabhas tayā īdṛśyā janamātrakṛpābhājanabhūtayā api yā sāmānyajanasya kṛpā bhavati, sāpi na asti tava ātmani iyatāpi puruṣaguṇaṃ bahumānaṃ vahato 'pi |
GK19aghatkvu:114: tathāpi sā śokārṇavapānīye meghasamayavāriṇā pātitā bhavadīyaguṇasmaraṇena eva rakṣyate |
GK19aghatkvu:115: athaca tvattas tava sakāśāt patitā śoke, bhavadviprayuktā ca jātā, śokajaladhau ca nimagnā sampannety arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:116: cakārād etad dhvanyate, vastutas tu tvadguṇānām eva sātiśayasambhogādīnāṃ smaraṇena eva śoke patitā |
GK19aghatkvu:117: adya tu tathā kṛpāpātratāṃ prāptā, yad uta tena niṣkaruṇena pātitā api tvadguṇasmaraṇena eva rakṣyate |
GK19aghatkvu:118: mama kila sa priyatamo 'pagato nirbahumāno māṃ prati ca dṛḍhatarapremapavitritāntaḥkaraṇo nūnaṃ mām eva tadavasthāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ trātavaṃs tathā trāsyate iti tvadguṇānāṃ smarantī sā jīvatīti yāvat |
GK19aghatkvu:119: tathā yo 'yaṃ sāgare patitaḥ, so 'pi avaśyaṃ guṇasmaraṇavṛttyā eva
GK19aghatkvu:120: rakṣyate dṛḍhaguṇaviracitarajjvavalambanena jātucid uttareyam apīty arthaḥ
GK19aghatkvu:122: dravati ca kaluṣaṃ jalaṃ nadīnāṃ kim iti ca māṃ samavekṣase na dīnām //
GK19aghatkvu:124: iyaṃ vilāpāvasthāṃ yātāyāḥ svayam eva nāyikāyā uktiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:125: puṣpitāni kuṭajāni yeṣu vaneṣu yāḥ samutsukā utkaṇṭhitā mādṛśyas tāsāṃ yāni ānanāni priyatamaviyuktāni teṣu tadviṣaye nadīnām api kaluṣaṃ jalaṃ galati asmādṛśīnāṃ virahiṇīnām ānanāni avalokya jaḍabhāvānām api kaluṣaṃ jalaṃ galati, asmādṛśīnāṃ virahiṇīsaritāṃ śokāvilaṃ jalaṃ galatīty arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:126: tvaṃ māṃ dīnāṃ kim iti samavekṣase 'pi na |
GK19aghatkvu:128: eka nadīnām ity asya anantaram, aparas tu samavekṣaseśabdasya || GhkV_8 ||
GK19aghatkvu:129: mārgeṣu meghasalilena vināśiteṣu kāmo dhanuḥ spṛśati tena vinā śiteṣu /
GK19aghatkvu:132: visṛṣṭāyām api dūtyāṃ tadvacanākarṇanād api na āgata iti śokākulamanasi nāyikāyāṃ yadā, kadācit sakhī tatsamāśvāsanāya ittham abhihitavatī --
GK19aghatkvu:133: mārgāṇāṃ duḥsañcaratvād asau na prāptaḥ, tadā punar api nāyikāyāḥ sakhiṃ prati iyam uktiḥ -- sakhi ! paśya , mārgā meghasalilena nāśitās tathāparo
GK19aghatkvu:134: 'yaṃ doṣaḥ -- apratyayeṣu mārgeṣu śitā iṣavo yatra tādṛk dhanuḥ spṛśati,
GK19aghatkvu:135: śitaṃ śiraṃ sandhāya ākarṇākṛṣṭaṃ moktum icchatīty arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:137: athaca yadi ahaṃ tam abhisareyam, tat mārgā durjñānāḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:138: tathāvidheṣu api teṣu duḥsahaṃ smaraśarabhayaṃ smaraś ca tadvarjaṃ śarān sandhatte mām eva tāḍayati, anyathā kadācit tasyaiva gamanam iha sambhāvyate |
GK19aghatkvu:139: atha ihasthā eva jaladasamayam ativāhayāmi, tat gambhīreṇa ghangarjitena jātatrāsā tiṣṭhāmi
GK19aghatkvu:140: ato he sakhi ! kadā ahaṃ priyaviyogajam
GK19aghatkvu:142: ahaṃ ca meghaśabdavyathitā, madanaś ca niśitaśarapātanodyata iti avaśyaṃ mama jīvitāntena bhāvyaṃ |
GK19aghatkvu:145: kecit sakhīpriyeti paṭhantaḥ sahṛdayāḥ katham adya api sakhī dūtītvena visṛṣṭā sā api na āgatā tat nūnaṃ tatsambhogarasalālasayā tayā bhāvyam iti sambhāvayantyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ kayācit vayasyayā mārgadaurātmye tadāgamanavighnakāriṇi upanyaste svayaṃ nāyikāyā idaṃ sūktam iti abhyūcuḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:146: mārgas tāvat naṣṭāḥ tena ca vinā madanaḥ praharatīti tannikaṭāt calituṃ na yujyate 'syāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:149: priyeṇa ca saha viyogaḥ, tathā tasyāḥ sakhyāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:150: idānīṃ yaḥ priyas tena saha viyogaḥ, tajjaṃ śokadāhaṃ kadā jīvitāntena api jahyām || GhkV_9
GK19aghatkvu:152: madanasya kṛte niketanānāṃ pratibhānty adya vanāni ketanānām // Ghk_10 //
GK19aghatkvu:153: yadā vinodārthaṃ sakhyā udyānopavanaṃ nītā, tadā taddarśanadviguṇataropacitavilāpāvasthāyā nāyikāyā idaṃ sūktam |
GK19aghatkvu:156: suṣṭhu saurabheṇa vanamadhye kenacid ajitānāṃ, tathā garjatāṃ meghānāṃ pavanena vījitānāṃ prabodhitānām |
GK19aghatkvu:157: ata eva kāmasya kṛte niketanānāṃ saṅketadhāmnām |
GK19aghatkvu:159: jaladhararasitatadvimuktaśīkarāsārasahitaś ca pavanas teṣām eva prabodhanahetutayā sukumāratām āpta iti kim atra jaladasamaye
GK19aghatkvu:161: ketanavānāvalokanaprabodhitamadanasthānasukhasaṃskāraḥ priyatama āgamiṣyatīti sambhāvayantyā nāyikāyā bhaṇitiḥ pratibhātīti |
GK19aghatkvu:162: apare tu vanaśabdapaunaruktyam amṛṣyamāṇā madanasya avane rakṣaṇe kṛte ajitānāṃ ketanānāṃ vanāni śobhante iti āhuḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:163: athavā saurabheṇa ye vane ekānte yatra aparaḥ paritrātā na sambhāvyate tatra jitā apahṛtadhairyavṛttayaḥ kṛtā vimohitāḥ kecana virahijanāḥ teṣāṃ daivavaśāt
GK19aghatkvu:164: jaladharaśiśirapavanaprabodhitānām api punar api etāni ketanavanāni kāmasya kṛte karaṇāya pratibhānti |
GK19aghatkvu:165: madanātaṅkakaraṇād ṛte na eteṣāṃ kim api prayojanam iti yāvat |
GK19aghatkvu:167: yadā svananto garjanto 'mbhodharā yatra saṃjātakṛpāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ, tatra amīṣāṃ ketanavanānāṃ kā iyaṃ niṣkaruṇatā || GhkV_10 ||
GK19aghatkvu:168: tat sādhu yat tvāṃ sutaruṃ sasarja prajāpatiḥ kāmanivāsa sarja /
GK19aghatkvu:169: tvaṃ mañjarībhiḥ pravaro vanānāṃ netrotsavaś cāsi sayauvanānām // Ghk_11
GK19aghatkvu:172: sasarja śobhanaṃ taruṃ, tat sādhu, yatas tvaṃ kāmasya nivāsaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:173: kākur iyaṃ evaṃ dhvanati -- prajānāṃ kila patyā avaśyaṃ prajāhitakāriṇā bhavitavyam,
GK19aghatkvu:174: evaṃvidhahṛdayadāhavitaraṇaniḥśeṣitanikhilajantoḥ kāmasya nivāsabhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ nirmimāṇena prajāpatinā suṣṭhu prajāpatitvam uddarśitaṃ, tvayi dṛṣṭamātra eva mama kāpi vyathā vijṛmbhate ity arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:175: atha evaṃ api jānatī kim iti mām avalokitavaty asīti yadi, tat kila mañjarībhir bhavān sakalavanamadhye śreṣṭho bahvībhiḥ kantābhis tu parivṛta iti śṛṅgāriṇi
GK19aghatkvu:176: bhavati bahumāna ity arthaḥ, tathāpi sayauvanānāṃ yuvatīnāṃ tu netrotsavaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:177: yadā kila ahaṃ yuvatiḥ priyasaṃyuktā tvām avalokitavatī, tadā lokottaranayanānandavatī abhūvam, adya tvam evaṃvidhabahutaravallabhāparivṛto bhūtvā kathaṃ māṃ priyaviyuktāṃ trātavyāṃ darśanamātreṇa api madanaparavaśāṃ karoṣīti vākyārthaḥ ||
GK19aghatkvu:178: navakadamba śiro 'vanatāsmi te vasati vo madanaḥ kusumasmite /
GK19aghatkvu:179: kuṭaja kiṃ kusumair avahasyate praṇipatāmi ca duṣprahasya te // Ghk_12 //
GK19aghatkvu:180: yadā sarjataror apakrāntā nāyikā jhagiti kadambam avalokayati, tadā prāktanamadanabhayabhītimatī jhagiti āha -- he navakadamba ! idānīm eva avalokitānubhūtatvadīyapratāpā ahaṃ tubhyaṃ śirasā avanatā asmi |
GK19aghatkvu:181: evaṃ yāvat bhaṇati, tāvat tadīyakusumavilokanajanitaraṇaraṇakā āha -- yuṣmākaṃ puṣpavikāse kāmo vasati, mayā jñātaṃ sarjasyaiva idaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ yāvatā
GK19aghatkvu:182: tvam api evam eva, sarveṣām ekayogakṣamateti sarvathā mama hātāśāyā nayanaviṣayatākṣamaṃ na kiñcit samastīti va iti bahuvacanena dhvanyate |
GK19aghatkvu:183: itthamākārayatnī eva nāyikā yadā kusumitaṃ jhagiti kuṭajam avalokayati,
GK19aghatkvu:184: tadā manyate nūnaṃ mām ayaṃ sarvato hi hatabhāgadheyām apahasatīti tata āha -- he kuṭaja ! kim iti avāṅmukhaṃ kṛtvā hasyate |
GK19aghatkvu:186: 'vaśyaṃ dharābhimukhaḥ, yaś ca sannihita eva param apahasati, so 'pi
GK19aghatkvu:189: te duḥsahasya praṇāma eva śobhana iti kākuḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:191: kiṃkusumair iti kutsitaiḥ parātaṅkavitaraṇacaturaiḥ puṣpair avahasyate iti sotprāsaṃ kākvā
GK19aghatkvu:193: taruvara vinatāsmi te sadāhaṃ hṛdayaṃ me prakaroṣi kiṃ sadāham /
GK19aghatkvu:194: tava puṣpanirīkṣitāpadehaṃ visṛjeyaṃ sahasaiva nīpa deham // Ghk_13 //
GK19aghatkvu:195: he nīpābhidhāna taruśrṣṭha ! tava sarvakālam ahaṃ praṇatā, tat kim adya mama hṛdayaṃ dāhayuktaṃ prakarṣeṇa karoṣi |
GK19aghatkvu:197: māṃ dahanti yathā tvaṃ sarvakālam abhiṣṭuto 'pi, sarvathā ayaṃ bhāgadheyaviparyayaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:198: athaca tava sadā ahaṃ praṇatā yena īdṛśaḥ upakāras tvat sambhāvyate, tvadīyapuṣpair nirīkṣitā dehaṃ visṛjeyam |
GK19aghatkvu:203: tāni tu yadi mahāpuruṣatayā evaṃvidhām avasthāṃ prāptāṃ mām avalokeyuḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:206: na ca evaṃ sambhāvanīyam -- ahito hṛdayadāhakāri kathaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:207: praṇamyate iti yataḥ kiṃ tvaṃ hṛdayaṃ sadāhaṃ karoṣi, kākvā na evam ity arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:208: nijena eva virahahutavahena mama dahyate hṛdayaṃ, tad idānīṃ dāhakena api dagdhasya kiṃ dahyate iti sambandhaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:209: yadi tu ahaṃśabdapaunaruktyaṃ sahṛdayāḥ kṣamante tadā evaṃ vyākhyā -- āpade viṣamavipadvahanārtham eva kevalaṃ yo mama dehas taṃ tyajeyam iti |
GK19aghatkvu:210: tathā nīpa taruvara tava natā asmi |
GK19aghatkvu:212: dāhayuktaṃ mama hṛdayaṃ prakaroṣi, punar api vilāpavaśāt, vicinitya brūte -- kiṃ yathā adya, tathā sarvakālaṃ tvatpuṣpekṣitā aham akāṇḍa eva dehaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:215: madhunaḥ samavekṣya kālatāṃ bhramaraś cumbati yūthikālatām // Ghk_14 //
GK19aghatkvu:216: ayaṃ bhramaraḥ bhramaṇaśīlaḥ yūthikaṃ cumbati, madīyapriyatamas tu pathika ekatra eva kvacit sthito mama nāma api na avekṣate iti |
GK19aghatkvu:218: sitair baddhair na tāvat vikasitaiḥ, tato 'nantaraṃ tu ghanair muktās tyaktā ye 'mbulavās taiḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ prahāsitaiḥ kusumair upalakṣitām |
GK19aghatkvu:219: athaca ghanā muktāphalasadṛśā ye jalakaṇāḥ tatkṛtāni yāni prahāsitāni prahāsitatvotpāditāni nijacchāyāsphuraṇāni yaiḥ pītāni api santi śuklāni jātāni kusumāni |
GK19aghatkvu:220: kiṃ kṛtvā madhuno makarandasya kālatām atyantaparipākarasotpannāṃ vilokya |
GK19aghatkvu:221: athaca yo nāyakaś cirāt kāntām upabhuṅkte, so 'pi madhunaḥ pānagoṣṭhyāḥ kālatām avasaraprāptim avalokya paricumbati |
GK19aghatkvu:222: kāla iti matvarthīyākārānto 'pi, tathā sā api kāntā dhammillapuṣpair ghanair muktāphalair virahasmaraṇānandādikotpannaiś ca
GK19aghatkvu:223: ambulavair bāṣpair harṣacāṭvādijaiḥ prahasitaiḥ sitair baddhair vyāmiśrarūpatayā sthitaiḥ parasparasaṃśliṣṭair upalakṣitā bhavati kilakiñcitaceṣṭālaṅkārayoginī bhavati viśeṣataḥ pānagoṣṭhyavasare yad uktaṃ "śuṣkaṃ muhuḥ praruditaṃ kṣaṇam aśrupātaḥ krodho muhur hasitam āśu
GK19aghatkvu:225: ata īdṛśī kadā ahaṃ priyeṇa paricumbyamānā bhuyāsam ity arthaḥ ||
GK19aghatkvu:227: salilair vihataṃ rajaḥ kṣitau ravicandrāv api nopalakṣitau // Ghk_15 //
GK19aghatkvu:230: mārgavaiṣamyād eva asāv iyantaṃ kālaṃ na āgataḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:231: tathāhi nīradair meghair upetya sarvatodikkaṃ saṅghaṭya khaṃ gaganaṃ nicitam |
GK19aghatkvu:232: kīdṛśaiḥ priyaiḥ priyābhiś ca ye vihīnā viyuktās teṣāṃ hṛdayāvanīṃ manobhūmīṃ radanti vilikhanti
GK19aghatkvu:233: evaṃ tāvat sarvatodikkaṃ duṣprekṣaṃ kṣitau bhūmau rajaḥ salilair vihatam |
GK19aghatkvu:234: āstāṃ tāvad anyat salilena abhibhūyate rajomātram api na avaśiṣṭam ity arthaḥ || GhkV_15 ||
GK19aghatkvu:235: haṃsā nadanmeghabhayād dravanti niśāmukhāny adya na candravanti /
GK19aghatkvu:236: navāmbumattāḥ śikhino nadanti meghāgame kundasamānadanti // Ghk_16 //
GK19aghatkvu:238: pratidūtyāś caiva nāyikāṃ prati uktiḥ -- evaṃ nāma meghāḥ śabdāyante yat haṃsā api palāyante, rātrāv api na sañcaraṇaṃ yujyate yataś candrayuktāni tanmukhāni na bhavanti, ete ca śikhino mayūrā udgatapraharṣavaśāt śabdāyante |
GK19aghatkvu:239: etena tat pratyuktaṃ yat tu nāyikayā pūrvam uktaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:241: ityādinā mārgasaukumāryaṃ, tad eva hi pratyuta raṇaraṇakapradīpakaṃ mārgasaṅkaṭatāṃ karotīty arthaḥ || GhkV_16 ||
GK19aghatkvu:242: meghāvṛttaṃ niśi na bhāti nabho vitāraṃ nidrābhyupaiti ca hariṃ śubhasevitāram /
GK19aghatkvu:243: sendrayudhaś ca jalado 'dya rasann ibhānāṃ saṃrambham āvahati bhūdharasannibhānām // Ghk_17
GK19aghatkvu:244: rātrisamaye 'pi gamanāgamane na yujyete, yato rātrisamaye vitāraṇ
GK19aghatkvu:245: vigatatārāpaṭalaṃ nabho na bhāti yato meghāvṛttam |
GK19aghatkvu:247: "pathikapāmsulo 'sau mām upekṣate" iti, tad api na yuktaṃ; śubhasevitāram akaluṣacaritam api bhagavantaṃ hariṃ nidrā abhyupaiti aśaknuvatī virahaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:249: indrāyudhayuktajalado rasan śabdāyamāna ibhānāṃ kariṇāṃ parvatasadṛśānāṃ saṃrambhaṃ saṃrabdhatām āvahati samantāt darśayati |
GK19aghatkvu:251: so 'pi anyānullaṅghanīyena śakrāyudhena vajreṇa sātiśayabhīṣaṇaḥ sādinā hatānāṃ kariṇāṃ sādṛśyam udvahatīty arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:252: athavā meghaḥ śabdāyamāna ibhānāṃ kariṇāṃ parvatasadṛśānāṃ saṃrambhaṃ janayati pratigarjanaśaṅkayeti te 'pi kṣubhitāḥ sampannā iti sarvathā susaṅkaṭāḥ panthānaḥ || GhkV_17 ||
GK19aghatkvu:254: paridhīraravaṃ jalaṃ darīṣu prapaty adbhutarūpasundarīṣu // Ghk_18 //
GK19aghatkvu:255: pratidūtyā eva iyam uktir nāyikā yadā evam āha nanu aham eva tatra
GK19aghatkvu:257: darīṣu guhāsu api antaḥsthitā yā adbhutarūpasundaryās tāsu api upari jalaṃ patatīti vyadhikaraṇasaptamyau
GK19aghatkvu:259: saha vidyudbhir jalam dadati ye, tair meghair arpitaṃ, na te jalamātraṃ dadati, yāvat vidyuto 'pi atibhīṣaṇā arpayantīti |
GK19aghatkvu:262: aparasya ye trāsadāyinas te 'pi yato jaladhararasitāt trasyanti, tatra kā vārtā bhavādṛśīnāṃ mālatīkusumasukumāramanasām iti tātparyārthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:264: darīṣu antaḥ paritaḥ samantāt dhīro gambhīro ravo yasya, kandarāsu antaḥ pratiśabdena dviguṇībhūta ity arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:265: tena eṣā api āśā na asti --
GK19aghatkvu:266: toyadajalapaṭalaṃ gaganāt nipatat kvacana guhāmukhe 'tivāhya punar api gamiṣyāma iti || kṣipraṃ prasādayati samprati ko 'pi tāni kāntāmukhāni rativigrahakopitāni
GK19aghatkvu:267: utkaṇṭhayanti pathikāṇ jaladāḥ svanantaḥ śoko vivardhati ca tadvinatāsv anantaḥ // Ghk_19
GK19aghatkvu:268: evam etābhir uktibhiḥ priyatamāgamanaṃ durghaṭam iti avagate āsthābandho nāyikāyā vijāghaṭītīty abhiprayeṇa sā eva punar āśvāsasampādanāya asya mādhyasthye viśeṣānuddeśāt tadīyahṛdayaśokaśikhiśamanaśaktām uktim abhidhatte -- ko 'pi
GK19aghatkvu:269: anirvaṇanīyapuṇyasambhārabṛṃhitaḥ samprati jaladasamaye tāni kāntāmukhāni niratiśayasaundaryavanti rativigraheṇa praṇayakupitena sañjātaroṣāṇi tathā yāni tadīyaviyogajanitapāṇḍimnā adya āsādhāraṇadharmasundarāṇi kṣipram anāyāsena eva prasādayati tvām avaśyaṃ prasādayatīti yāvat |
GK19aghatkvu:270: nanu na adyāpi asāv āgatas tat katham etat |
GK19aghatkvu:271: āha śabdāyamānā hi jaladharāḥ pathikān raṇaraṇakavataḥ kurvanti niścitaṃ dinād dinam upacīyamānajaladharadhvānākarṇanena parivardhitotkaṇṭhaḥ priyatamas tāvad āgacchatīti yāvat |
GK19aghatkvu:273: āha tadvanitāsu pathikadayitāsu tathā śoko vivardhati vivṛddhavad ācarati yathā anantaḥ sampadyate
GK19aghatkvu:274: cakāreṇa evaṃ dhvanyate tad eva rasitaṃ tāsāṃ śokavivṛddhau kāraṇam iti || GhkV_19 ||
GK19aghatkvu:275: atra kecid iti paṭhanti tāsām ṛtuḥ saphala eva hi yā dineṣu sendrāyudhāmbudharagarjitadurdineṣu
GK19aghatkvu:276: ratyutsavaṃ priyatamaiḥ saha mānayanti meghāgamaṃ priyasakhi śvasamānayanti // Ghk_20 //
GK19aghatkvu:277: ayaṃ śloko 'tratya iva na lakṣyate, pustakeṣu kena kāraṇena gata iti na vidmaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:278: tathāhi pūrvaślokaucityaṃ tāvad arthena na bhajate |
GK19aghatkvu:279: tāsām eva saphala ṛtur varṣākhyo yāti yā sendrāyudhair ambudair durdineṣu priyatamaiḥ saha ratyutsavaṃ mānayanti |
GK19aghatkvu:281: meghāgamaṃ śvasamāḥ sārameyaprāyā api nayanti -- iti vyākhyāyāṃ prāktane
GK19aghatkvu:284: yān astaṃ gacchann ino mārtaṇḍo yeṣu dineṣu -- ity api vyākhyāne tāsām iti apekṣito yadartho durupapādaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:285: tāsām iti tu anapekṣitayadarthe padavyaṅgye dhvanau vyākhyāyamāne uttaravākyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ gacchet caramārdhe cānyatheti (?) madhye śāstranyāyopacitaḥ kāvyāmṛtakāluṣaikakāraṇam adhyāhāraḥ kalpyaḥ śvasamā meghāgamaṃ nayantīti
GK19aghatkvu:287: na ca evaṃvidhena anaucityena kulakaparisamāptiḥ kriyamāṇā sahṛdayacetaḥsu romanthād ṛte kiñcit vidadhyāt |
GK19aghatkvu:288: śvasatīti śvasas tadvad ācaratīti kvip tato 'pi tācchīlyādivivakṣāyāṃ cānaś |
GK19aghatkvu:289: tataḥ priyasakhiśabdena sambandhaḥ prāg eva vā |
GK19aghatkvu:293: priyasakhiṣv iti saptamyā samāsa iti bahuvacanānte 'pi na kaścit kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:295: kiñca atra kartā mahākaviḥ kālidāsa iti anuśrutam asmābhiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:296: na ca asya kāvye tṛṇamātram api kalaṅkapātram utprekṣitavanto manorathe'; pi supte 'pi sahṛdayāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:298: | sa ca sakhyā pratidūtībhūtayā nāyikāyā āsthābandhadārḍhyotpādanāya
GK19aghatkvu:300: utpannasamāśvāsā hi hṛdayaṃ sthāpayantī vipralambhayituṃ śakyā
GK19aghatkvu:305: tena asya parisamāptidhurodvahasya api durandharatvam avikalam eveti |
GK19aghatkvu:306: tad idaṃ yuktam ayuktaṃ veti svayam eva vidāṃ kuruta sahṛdayāḥ || GhkV_20 ||
GK19aghatkvu:307: bhāvānuraktalalanāsurataiḥ śapeyam ālabhya cāmbu tṛṣitaḥ karakośapeyam /
GK19aghatkvu:308: jīyeya yena kavinā yamakaiḥ pareṇa tasmai vaheyam udakaṃ ghaṭakarpareṇa //
GK19aghatkvu:309: kavinā auddhatyaprakaṭanāya sahṛdayajanamānasarañjanāya pratijñā iyam upanibadhyate |
GK19aghatkvu:310: sañjātapipāsaḥ karakośena hastasampuṭena peyaṃ pānārhaṃ tāvad avasaraprāptam api jalam atyantābhilāṣautsukyapātram adrohayogyam api pratyuta ālabhya drugdhvā sahajapremapraṇayinīsambhogarasaiś ca śapeyam |
GK19aghatkvu:311: atra śarīrasparśanākhyasya upālambhasya na atīva spaṣṭateti
GK19aghatkvu:313: yena pareṇa kavinā yamakair jīyeya, tasmai ghaṭakarpareṇa jalaṃ vaheyam |
GK19aghatkvu:315: atra ca yamakānāṃ vipralambhaśṛṅgārarasātiśayavighnabhūtānām api mayā tathā apṛthagyatnanirvartyatayā nibandhaḥ kṛtaḥ, yena pratyuta rasaparipoṣakaviśiṣṭavyākhyābhidhāyipadaparamparālābho yamakaiḥ sampannaḥ
GK19aghatkvu:324: na hi iyaṃ rājājñā, api tu rasabandhavighnakāritvapramādaḥ
GK19aghatkvu:326: atra ca pratyuta ātmaparipoṣakatvam eva uktena prakāreṇa yamakānām iti |
GK19aghatkvu:327: kavīnāṃ śaktir eva balīyasī, sā eva lokottarā vyutpattir iti abhidhīyate; na tu anyā kaviśakter vyutpattir nāma kācit |
GK19aghatkvu:328: yad uktaṃ mayā eva raurave vicāre
GK19aghatkvu:329: "na vai doṣā doṣā na ca khalu guṇā eva ca guṇā nibandhuḥ svātantryaṃ sapadi guṇadoṣān vibhajate
GK19aghatkvu:330: iyaṃ sā vaidagdhī prakṛtimadhurā tasya sukaver yad atrotpādād apy atisubhagabhāvaḥ pariṇataḥ
